deviceTimeError.message: Believe it or not, but we can’t allow you to log in because the clock on your device is off by more than five minutes. Please set the time and try again.

permissionRequestDenied.message: You need to approve our request to access your Tunnistamo profile in order to use this service. Please try logging in again.

genericError.message: An error occured while logging in. Please try again

berthErrors.explanation: You cannot delete your information because Boat berths service needs your information for billing. Contact the customer service of Berth service to terminate your contract. After that has been done, you can try again.
berthErrors.title: The operation cannot be completed.

confirmationModal.saveMessage: The information you have changed is immediately available to the following City of Helsinki services:
confirmationModal.saveTitle: Do you want to save your changes?

createProfile.heading: Fill in your details to create a profile
createProfile.helpText: By creating a profile you can manage your information in one place.

deleteProfile.accept: I understand what deleting my data means and wish to proceed.
deleteProfile.explanation: If you want to, you can delete all information we have stored about you. The information cannot be restored after it has been deleted. If you have connected your profile to one of the services of the City of Helsinki, you can no longer use the service until you create a new profile. After deleting you will be automatically logged out of this service. Note that the account you have used to log in (for example Google or Facebook) will not be deleted.
deleteProfile.title: Do you want to delete your information?

deleteProfileModal.explanation: By continuing you will lose all of your stored data and you can no longer use the following City of Helsinki services:
deleteProfileModal.noServiceExplanation: By continuing you will lose all of your stored data.
deleteProfileModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete your information?

downloadData.panelText: If you want to see all our stored information about you, you can download them here. The information will be delivered as a file in a fixed format so you can move it into some other system if you want to.
downloadData.panelTitle: Do you want to download your information?

navigation.language: Language: English. Change language. Vaihda kieli. Ändra språk.

login.description: By signing in to the new Helsinki city services, a Helsinki profile is created for you. Here you can easily find your profile information and see all the services you have signed in with it.
login.title: Your profile information in one address!

nav.titleAriaLabel: Go to homepage of the Profile

notification.defaultErrorText: Something went wrong. Try again after a while.

profileDeleted.message: You can recreate it later if you want. You will be logged out after {{time}} seconds.
profileDeleted.title: Your profile has been successfully removed!

profileForm.makePhonePrimary: Change to your primary phone number
profileForm.termsLabel: EN: Olen tutustunut palvelun rekisteriselosteeseen ja kaupungin tietosuojakäytäntöön
profileForm.terms: Read <0>file description</0> and  city's <1>data protection principles</1>

profileInformation.description: EN: Helsinki Profiili mahdollistaa tietojesi käytön kaikissa Helsingin verkkopalveluissa joissa vaaditaan tunnistautumista. Yhdet tiedot, helposti käytettävissä monissa eri palveluissa. Kätevää eikö?
profileInformation.name: Name
profileInformation.title: My information
profileInformation.visibility: The following information about you is stored in Helsinki profile.
profileInformation.primaryPhoneAriaDescription: This is your primary phone number
profileInformation.verifiedDataInformation: EN: <0></0> tiedot on vahvistettu virallisesta väestötietojärjestelmästä, eikä niitä ei voi tämän takia muokata Helsinki Profiilissa. Voit tutustua halutessasi väestötietojärjestelmään tallennettuihin tietoihisi suomi.fi verkkopalvelussa: <1>siirry suomi.fi palveluun </1>
profileInformation.ariaComboBoxHelperText: Select {{field}}. Search by typing and select one option. {{requiredInfo}}
profileInformation.noPhones: You haven't given any phone numbers
profileInformation.verifyEmailText: EN: Olemme lähettäneet lisäämääsi sähköpostiosoitteeseen vahvistusviestin. Sähköpostiosoitteesi toimii myös sisäänkirjautumistunnuksena, joten et voi kirjautua sisään jos et ole vahvistanut tunnustasi. Jos et saanut viestiä, tarkasta myös sähköpostin roskaposti-kansio.

serviceConnections.empty: You currently don't have any services connected to your profile.
serviceConnections.explanation: You have given the following services permission to use your Helsinki Profile data.
serviceConnections.servicePersonalData: Information which the service will know about you:
serviceConnections.title: Services with permission to use your data

validation.email: The value must be an email-address.
validation.maxLength: This field can be max {{max}} characters.
validation.phoneMin: The number must be at least {{min}} characters long.
